name: Aerospace Training Academy of South Africa
about: Aerospace Training Academy of South Africa (ATASA) is a premier institution dedicated to providing comprehensive aviation education. Established to meet the industry's standard education needs, ATASA offers programs in aircraft maintenance and overhaul, aircraft performance engineering, and simulator operations. Our School of Engineering provides a 1 Year Certificate Course and a 3 Year Diploma Course in Aircraft Maintenance Engineering, accredited by the South African Civil Aviation Authority and the Quality Council for Trades & Occupations. We partner with national and international organizations to offer fully funded courses and study loans, ensuring our students are well-equipped for various roles in the aviation industry. With a team of industry specialists, ATASA delivers quality and exceptional service, preparing students for successful careers in air transport.
services:
["Aircraft Avionician Apprentice Training
Aircraft Electrical Apprentice Training
Aircraft Instrument Apprentice Training
Aircraft Radiotrician Apprentice Training
CATS & CARS"]
